plot: The series follows the story of a young ambitious man who's determine to move forward in his life but is really pushing himself back because of his personal demons.
plot_en: The series follows the story of a young ambitious man who's determine to move forward in his life but is really pushing himself back because of his personal demons.

title: Repercussions
